articles.author: Tom Nicholson
articles.title: Slovak PM Fico offered to host Moscow-Kyiv peace talks, Putin claims - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: “Why not?” Russian president asked reporters. “For us it’s an acceptable alternative.”
articles.content: The unannounced pre-Christmas meeting between Fico and Putin was reported at the time as an attempt by the Slovak leader to find a way around Kyivs refusal to extend Russian gas deliveries to Bratisl… [+975 chars]
